description.raw:
I added a new param accessor to `PhysicsEngine` that returns a boolean and takes an output parameter as a reference. It returns false if the input key was not found and does not change the output value. This makes the API more robust and communicative about errors.

p.s. The branch name is a little misleading because my original intention was to create a templated function that automatically casts the boost::any value to a primitive type, but I will address this in a future PR.
